thread.title: Target Clearance: BIG Savings On Furniture & More
thread.title_full: Target Clearance: BIG Savings On Furniture & More

author: Hannah (Sensational Sidekick)
title: Target Clearance: BIG Savings On Furniture & More
text:
Target Shoppers! If you are headed to Target soon, be sure and keep your eyes peeled for possible HUGE markdowns in the home department. Keep in mind clearance items may vary greatly by region. Also, please note that the prices/availability aren’t always accurate, so be sure to scan the item in store to confirm local pricing.
HIP TIP – Before making a special trip, head on over here first and enter your zip code and the DCPI numbers listed below to check stock and price of these items at your local store.
Here are a few of the deals you may be able to score… Threshold Storage Ottoman with Nailheads $44.98 (regularly $149.99) 
-DCPI #: 249-12-2125

Brother Sewing Machine $59.98 (regularly $119.99) 
-DCPI#: 072-12-0269

Room Essentials 3-Door Cart $5.38 (regularly $17.99) (regularly $34.99) 
-DCPI #: 002-11-0591
Use the 15% Off Plastic Storage Cartwheel Offer -will deduct 81¢
Final Cost $4.57!

Room Essentials 2-Door Organizer $17.48 (regularly $34.99) 
-DCPI #: 002-11-0591

Threshold Storage Ottoman with Nailheads Beige Finish $26.98 (regularly $89.99) 
-DCPI #: 249-12-2467

Conair Fabric Steamer $29.98 (regularly $59.99) 
-DCPI #: 072-07-0011

Bissell Red Deep Cleaner $24.98 (regularly 
-DCPI #: 249-12-2467
…And remember , if you’re a Target REDcard holder , you’ll get an additional 5% off your purchases!
